Package com.adamsvestka.pijl.rerecodex

Class ReCodEx

java.lang.Object
com.adamsvestka.pijl.rerecodex.ReCodEx
public class ReCodEx extends Object
A class that contains methods for communicating with the ReCodEx API. Methods return CompletableFutures that can be used to asynchronously retrieve the results.

      public static CompletableFuture<Response> authenticate(String username, String password)
      Authenticates the user with the given credentials and returns a CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

      kinda hacky

      Parameters:
      username - The username.
      password - The password.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

    • getInstances

      public static CompletableFuture<Response> getInstances(UUID userId)
      Retrieves the list of instances the user has access to and returns a CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

      GET https://recodex.mff.cuni.cz/api/v1/user/{userId}/instances

      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

    • getGroups

      public static CompletableFuture<Response> getGroups(boolean ancestors, UUID instanceId)
      Retrieves the list of groups the user is a member of and returns a CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

      GET https://recodex.mff.cuni.cz/api/v1/groups

      Parameters:
      ancestors - Whether to include ancestor groups.
      instanceId - The instance ID.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

    • getUser

      public static CompletableFuture<Response.Payload> getUser(UUID userId)
      Get details about the user with the given ID and returns a CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

      GET https://recodex.mff.cuni.cz/api/v1/users/{userId}

      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

    • getAssignments

      public static CompletableFuture<List<Response.Payload>> getAssignments(UUID groupId)
      Retrieves the list of assignments for the given group and returns a CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

      GET https://recodex.mff.cuni.cz/api/v1/groups/{groupId}/assignments

      Parameters:
      groupId - The group's ID.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

    • getStats

      public static CompletableFuture<List<Response.Payload>> getStats(UUID groupId)
      Retrieves statistics about assignments in a given group and returns a CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

      GET https://recodex.mff.cuni.cz/api/v1/groups/{groupId}/students/stats

      Parameters:
      groupId - The group's ID.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

    • getCanSubmit

      public static CompletableFuture<Response.Payload> getCanSubmit(UUID groupId)
      Retrieves the list of submissions for assignments in a given group and returns a CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.

      GET https://recodex.mff.cuni.cz/api/v1/exercise-assignments/{groupId}/can-submit

      Parameters:
      groupId - The group's ID.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that can be used to retrieve the result.
